visible.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something that is visible can be seen
visible.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Check the plant for any visible signs of disease.
The outline of the mountains was clearly visible.
The sign was clearly visible to passing motorists.
The comet is visible to the naked eye (=can be seen without using special equipment).
visible.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an effect that is visible is great enough to be noticed
visible.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: There has been a visible change in his attitude.
visible.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone who is visible is in a situation in which a lot of people notice them
visible.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: The fracture was clearly visible on the X-ray.
Cyclists should wear highly visible colours.
By July 26, Mercury should be easily visible in the evening sky.
The parked car was barely visible in the darkness.
The comet is now visible to the naked eye.
He considered the expensive car a visible sign of his achievement.
